title: About Sportrail
hero_text: Portugal's premier football education institution, developing elite players and coaches since 2016.
mission: To democratize access to world-class football education and development opportunities, connecting talent with the best coaches, clubs, and methodology the Iberian Peninsula has to offer.
story: Founded in 2016 in Oeiras, Portugal, Sportrail has grown from a small coaching education provider into one of Portugal's most respected football institutions. With over 2,500 coaches trained and partnerships across Portugal and Spain, we bridge the gap between aspiring professionals and the elite football ecosystem.
